meanings.definition: A person who is mentally unstable or insane.
meanings.sent1: The town was abuzz with rumors about the nutcases living in the old mansion.
meanings.sent2: The police were called to deal with the nutcases causing a disturbance at the park.
meanings.sent3: The nutcases at the circus made the audience laugh with their silly antics.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned asylum was said to be haunted by the spirits of the nutcases who once lived there.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie featured a group of escaped nutcases terrorizing a small town.

meanings.definition: A person who behaves in a bizarre or eccentric manner.
meanings.sent1: The artist was known for attracting a crowd with his nutcases at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The eccentric billionaire surrounded himself with a team of creative nutcases.
meanings.sent3: The nutcases at the costume party turned heads with their outlandish outfits.
meanings.sent4: The quirky cafe was a favorite hangout for local nutcases and free spirits.
meanings.sent5: The comedy show featured a group of hilarious nutcases getting into all sorts of mischief.
